title: "Tap to translate" icon always show on display
content: After updating my phone to Android 10, button "Tap to translate" always displayed on screen. In older Android versions, he appeared only when I copied text and it was very convenient. But now she is constantly on the screen and it really hinders. Someone know it is bug or it should be so? Is it possible to do something about this?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
